Combine...

attachments.displayName:
ITEM CODE # 205; FASHION STUD GUARD GIRTH WITH STRAP.

Best Price USD 75.00 + Shipping USD 18.00.
Combine Shipping discounts also offered.

The girth's reinforced belly guard avoids any long term deformation occurring and allows better absorption in case of shock. The elastic sections on both sides make breathing easier for the horse. Triple Layer elastic fixed onto stainless steel roller buckles & has central clip and two D-rings at each end of the girth makes the girthing to be softer and comfortable.
White/ Cream Stitching, with soft skin inner Lining makes this product very admirable. This Belly Pad girth offers a simple and practical use for every day riding. Its straight and the practical characteristics make it a nice product. Quality leather makes this a durable and attractive girth.
Available length: 110 cm (43"), 115 cm (45"), 120 cm (47"), 125 cm (49"), 130 cm (51"), 135 cm (53"), 140 cm (55"), 145 cm (57").

Available in Black, Oak Bark (Reddish Brown) or Havana (Brown) Shade.

Visit our website www.royalsports88.com.
or contact us equestrian@royalsports88.com
